msbt.message: Thanks for inviting me over! I feel like I got to see a...secret...side of you! Oh, right! I got inspired by your...secret...side. And I bought you a secret thing. It's attached!
Your place is cool! I'm still SUPER interested in that secret room! WHAT'S IN THERE?! Ah well, everyone has their secrets. Here's my thanks for the tour! (It's a secret to everybody, OK?)
I had a lot of fun checking out your house! Visiting a friend's place is a solid way to get interior design ideas.
I wrote you a poem: "Thanks for inviting me over. Your whole layout was very...you. Was that furniture backwards? Or is mine facing the wrong way?"
I enjoyed seeing your house the other day! But...you didn't have ANY furniture you'd need for, you know, daily life? So I decided to get you some! I hope you like it!

Thanks for showing me your place! It was SO cozy and, you know, full of things you need for daily life. Is that weird to say? "Daily life." It feels weird. "Daily life." Who SAYS that? Anyhoo, I got you a thing.
Thank you for showing me your interior-design skills! By the way, did you end up putting something (anything?!) on the walls after I left? Well, just in case, I got you something to hang up! Enjoy!

You've got SO MANY rare items in your place! It was exciting to see them all! I've got to learn to hunt treasure! Here's a prezzie to say thanks for the tour. I thought you'd "dig" it! Get it? Dig? Treasure?
Thanks so much for the tour of your place the other day! I was so nervous because of all the REALLY expensive furniture! It's not much, but I got you something to say thanks for the tour!
Thanks for having me over the other day! I know you're not the type that has a lot of things? But I decided to get you some furniture anyway! I think you'll like it!
I had fun at your house the other day! There were so many THINGS to look at! It was all very, very... impressive! I got you a gift! I hope I managed to hit your style.

Thanks for the tour the other day! After I left your place, I did a little furniture hunting for you, and I thiiiiink this will give your room a little extra sizzle! Or pizzazz. Or awesomenessosity. One of those.
